mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM um_permission LEFT JOIN um_role_permission ON um_permission.id = um_role_permission.permid LEFT JOIN um_role ON um_role.rid = um_role_permission.rid LEFT JOIN um_user_role ON um_user_role.rid = um_role.rid LEFT JOIN um_user ON um_user.uid = um_user_role.uid WHERE um_user.uid=#{userid} AND um_permission.del_flag = 0 AND um_user.del_flag = 0
